Package CAMs_App.service

Class StaffCampService

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.service.CampManagementService
CAMs_App.service.StaffCampService
public class StaffCampService extends CampManagementService
The class StaffCampService is responsible in managing the camp-related functionalities for staff users. This class also extends from CampManagementService to obtain the various reports.
